required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of CKD-386
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Multi-center, Therapeutic Confirmatory, Phase III Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of D013, D326 and D337 Combination Therapy in Dyslipidemia Patients With Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of CKD-386

primary_outcome.measure: Change rate from baseline in LDL-C
primary_outcome.description: Compare experimental group 1 with comparator group 1
Compare experimental group 1 with comparator group 2

intervention.description: Experimental: Group 1 Patients assigned to this group are treated with D013, D326, D337
intervention.other_name: Drugs are consist of antihypertensive agent and antihyperlipidemic agent

intervention.description: Placebo Comparator: Group 1 Patients assigned to this group are treated with D326, D337, placebo of D013
intervention.other_name: Drugs are consist of antihypertensive agent and antihyperlipidemic agent

intervention.intervention_name: D013, placebo of D326, placebo of D337
intervention.description: Placebo Comparator: Group 2 Patients assigned to this group are treated with D013, placebo of D326, placebo of D337
intervention.other_name: Drugs are consist of antihypertensive agent and antihyperlipidemic agent

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Subjects are diagnosed with Dyslipidemia Patients with Hypertension or are being administered anti-hypertension and anti-hypertension drugs after diagnosis.
2. Subjects who agreed to participate in this clinical trial voluntarily.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Subjects who were satisfied specific blood pressure levels that measured at screening period.
2. Subjects who were satisfied specific lipid levels that measured at screening period.
3. Subjects who cannot participate in a clinical trial based on the PI's judgment.

facility.name: Yonsei University Medical Center Severance Hospital
